creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: black torii gate at LL in front of river; daimyo procession in purple crosses wooden and stone bridge behind gate; four blind men with staphs stand in a line at riverbank; village in background; temple and shrine on top of rocky, tree covered bluff in background
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar ULC; ULQ
title: Fujisawa, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
